    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String name,
            int capacity,
            int earliestStartTime,
            int closingTime)
        Initializes an object of Room with a a randomly generated ID, set capacity, set earliest start time and set closing start time for the room, empty schedule and given name. All events using the room must end at or before 23:00 of the same day. There will be at least 1 hour down time everyday from 23:00 to 00:00 where no events can be scheduled for.
        Parameters:
        name - a string object that represents the name of the room.
        capacity - an integer object that represents the maximum number of attendees allowed to be in the room. Must be greater than 0.
        earliestStartTime - an integer object that represents the earliest start time the room will be open for an event in a 24 hour clock cycle. So 0 means the room will open at 00:00. earliestStartTime must be between 0 to 22.
        closingTime - an integer object that represents the time that the room will close and events must end before this time of the day in a 24 hour clock cycle. So 22 means the room will close at 22:00 and all events must end before that time. closingTime must be between 1 to 23.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if earliestStartTime is less than 0 or closingTime is more than 23 or closingTime is less than or equal to earliestStartTime or capacity is less than or equal to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoomID

        public java.util.UUID getRoomID()
        Get room's unique ID.
        Returns:
        the UUID that represents the room

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        Get the capacity of the room.
        Returns:
        an integer that represents maximum number of attendees allowed in the room for an event.

      • checkRoomAvailability

        public boolean checkRoomAvailability(java.time.LocalDateTime dateAndTime,
                                     int duration)
        Check if room is available to be booked for an event at the given starting time slot for given duration
        Parameters:
        dateAndTime - a LocalDateTime object that represents the start time that will be checked if room is available to booked.
        duration - an integer object that represents the number of hours from the starting time that needs to be checked.
        Returns:
        true iff there is an open slot at the given starting time and is within the opening time of the room. Return false otherwise.

      • bookRoom

        public void bookRoom(java.time.LocalDateTime dateAndTime,
                     java.util.UUID eventID,
                     int duration)
        Book a time slot of the room for an event if the timeslot is available.
        Parameters:
        dateAndTime - a LocalDateTime object that represents the start time of the event.
        eventID - a UUID that represents the unique ID of the event that will be hosted at the given time.
        duration - an integer object that represents the number of hours that will be booked.
